name: Wacky Wobblers
description:
Wacky Wobblers is a fast pace platform game where the user must avoid incoming obstacles, swipe, drag & flick to get as far as you can.
Black and white, noir and snow style game.
Customise your Wobbler cart and guy!
Use the built in camera to see yourself as a wobbler!
GameCenter leaderboard and achievements!
With cross-platform highscores table!

- Promo Youtube Video In-game Footage

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9uE5jskPqeo&feature=youtu.be
